All trainers and assessors delivering online or blended programs at RMIT hold a minimum qualification of Certificate IV Training and Assessment and remain current in their industry or field of expertise. This enables trainers and assessors to deliver real world learning experiences.Trainers and assessors undertake internal professional development in blended and online delivery based on RMIT Capability Framework for Educators.
